entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 10:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
